name: Sofaer Capital
overview: Sofaer Capital, one of the longest established hedge fund managers, was founded by Michael Sofaer in Hong Kong in 1986. The Firm today manages over $225mm in AUM across five fundamental equity long/short strategies and retains highly experienced Asian and global investment teams within Sofaer Global Research to manage these strategies. Sofaer Global Research employs over 18 investment professionals and staff in offices in London and Hong Kong.
